Hydras:

"Good warriors like them are hard to find"hissed Hydras"And i cant afford 
loose any one else... If we desire to sucssed over MAximals and other treats 
we must stick together and avoid unecesary looses... So my tutor, What do 
you want in exchange for my men, the base  and the protphorm? "

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, November 08, 2010 11:27 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> Hydras:
>
> "Not mere a spark, my tutor"hissed Hydras"A blank protophorm and my men...
> What do you need or wish to exchange?"

Crytoke leans back on his throne again, his bulk shifting slightly in
the ornate chair, the lights from the chamber reflecting off his deep
colbalt blue armor. His crimson optics stare down at Hydras, his
quirking slightly in some form of repressed humor, "Ahh yess, you seek
a protoform, a blank cybertronain, upon which you can imprint anything
you like."

Shaking his head Cryotek smiles coldly, "You ask for much and yet you
have brought nothing to give." Cryotek opened his hand as he gestured
to Hydras, "Yet I offer you much, a base and your men, and yet you
refused."

Cryotek tilts his head, as if confused by Hydras, "Why should I give
you what you are asking for? I may have my own plans with them."

(TAG)

Preston
